description: Records daily demand quantities for each product over time. Tracks historical demand patterns with 10,764 records spanning multiple products and dates for demand forecasting and trend analysis.
business_purpose: Used for demand forecasting, inventory planning, and identifying seasonal trends in product consumption

description: Maintains current stock levels and automated reorder settings for 28 products. Includes safety stock thresholds, reorder points, warehouse locations, and restocking history to prevent stockouts.
key_columns: product_id, current_stock, reorder_point, reorder_quantity, safety_stock, status, last_restocked, warehouse_location
business_purpose: Monitors inventory levels, triggers automatic reordering when stock falls below reorder points, and tracks warehouse locations for efficient stock management

description: Links products to their suppliers with procurement specifications. Contains 38 supplier-product relationships including lead times, minimum order quantities, and primary supplier designations for each product.
business_purpose: Manages supplier relationships, procurement lead times, and minimum order requirements to optimize purchasing decisions and supplier selection

description: Master catalog of 28 products with complete product information including SKUs, names, categories, pricing, costs, physical specifications (weight, dimensions), and detailed descriptions.
key_columns: product_id, sku, name, category, unit_price, cost, description, unit, weight_kg, dimensions
business_purpose: Central product reference for all operations including sales, inventory, pricing, and logistics. Provides complete product specifications and profit margin calculations

description: Complete transaction history with 17,336 sales records capturing every sale including date, product, quantity, pricing, total amount, and customer identifier for revenue and customer analytics.
key_columns: transaction_id, date, product_id, quantity, unit_price, total_amount, customer_id
business_purpose: Tracks all sales transactions for revenue reporting, customer purchase behavior analysis, product performance evaluation, and financial reconciliation

description: Directory of 5 suppliers with contact information including names, email addresses, and phone numbers for procurement and vendor management communications.
business_purpose: Maintains supplier contact information for purchase orders, communication, vendor management, and procurement operations
